text: Prince Yormie Johnson (6 July 1952 - 28 November 2024) was Liberian politician. He became Senior Senator from Nimba County in 2006. He served until his death. He was a rebel leader. Johnson played an important role in the Liberia civil wars. He captured, tortured and killed President Samuel Doe. Johnson died in a hospital in Paynesville, Liberia on 28 November 2024, at the age of 72. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Liberian politicians Category:African military people Category:Generals
title: Prince Johnson
